article_title: NEW: Ted Cruz campaigns in Cheyenne
article_text:
Cheyenne, WY (82001)

Today

Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Overcast. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

og.description: CHEYENNE (WTE) - Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz said during a campaign stop today in Cheyenne that he would end the "war on coal" if he is elected to the
